textBox.richText: The New Meadowlands Stadium is an 85,000 seat US$1.7 billion complex. We were lucky enough to see the second game ever played there (the first was only a week earlier) with the NY Giants taking on the Pittsburg Steelers. Unfortunately the Giants went down 24 to 17. American Football is an exceptionally interesting game - Four 15 minute quarters take about 3 hours. Obviously to allow you plenty of time to make multiple trips to the frank stand to get yourself an artery hardening ketchup, mustard and relish covered dog! Seats were amazing though - seven rows from the front - right on 10 yard line. Great work from AJ scoring these!
